'''The Gang''' is a group of young {{MC}} players who frequent the [[Ever Realm]] [[server]], often hanging out in person. Prior to the events of the series, they were primarily real world friends, but after [[Tyler Collins|Tyler]] moved they began playing together in Minecraft.
